column2: Birks Group, Inc. engages in the designing of jewelry, timepieces and gift and operates jewelry stores. The company is headquartered in Montreal, Quebec and currently employs 732 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: Retail and Other. The firm's Retail segment consists of all its retail operations in the United States and Canada on a combined basis. As of October 23, 2017, the Retail segment operated 28 stores across Canada under the Birks brand, as well as two retail locations in Calgary and Vancouver under the Brinkhaus brand. The firm's Other segment consists primarily of its e-commerce business, gold exchange business, which purchases gold and other precious metals from clients and refines the metals purchased, and wholesale business. The firm's merchandise includes designer jewelry, diamond, gemstone and precious metal jewelry.
